Articles.Content: It's looking really nice!
Now this is ..... Mind-blowing ! Superb work on the modeling , the texturing ... welll ... everything ! It's quite a beauty . Lots of talent here for sure !

Final render of Titan 403B. All the fairings, payload adapters and upper stages are all also modeled, textured and in the game at this point. I'll get some renders of those up as well once I have some more spare time.

![7E8ih11.png](http://i.imgur.com/7E8ih11.png)

that looks great!

love the texturing

> 
> 
> 4 minutes ago, popeter45 said:
> 
> 
> that looks great!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> love the texturing
> 

Thanks, appreciate it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") Yea I spent quite some time on deciding how to go about texturing the core tank, and I'm quite happy with how it came out. I got it to look as realisic as is possible with the current KSP shaders. I'll go over the textures once more and make them look even more realistic once KSP 1.2 hits and we get fully use PBR shaders.

> Thanks, appreciate it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") Yea I spent quite some time on deciding how to go about texturing the core tank, and I'm quite happy with how it came out. I got it to look as realisic as is possible with the current KSP shaders. I'll go over the textures once more and make them look even more realistic once KSP 1.2 hits and we get fully use PBR shaders.

oh snap I forgot we all have to set those up...

> 
> 
> 2 minutes ago, CobaltWolf said:
> 
> 
> oh snap I forgot we all have to set those up...
> 

Yup, it's going to be a lot of work, but it is going to make the parts look so much better.
Are those going to be <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr> only or there will be stock balanced patches down the line?

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, \_Krieger\_ said:
> 
> 
> Are those going to be <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)"><abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr></abbr> only or there will be stock balanced patches down the line?
> 

I will not provide any stock support, simply because modeling, texturing, Unity and configuring all of these launch vehicles takes up too much of my time as it is.. My focus will solely be on <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>/RealFuels compability and <abbr title="Real Solar System (mod)">RSS</abbr>/<abbr title="Realism Overhaul (mod)">RO</abbr> compability. However, if anyone does rebalance any of the launch vehicle packs for the stock solar system (or any of the 3.2x, 6.4x sclaes), I'll will of course gladly add those files as separate downloads. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
liquidhype do you think i could have a wack at making some stock configs?

> 
> 
> 37 minutes ago, popeter45 said:
> 
> 
> liquidhype do you think i could have a wack at making some stock configs?
> 

If you mean "have a wack" as in you want to try to do it, then no. If you mean "have a wack" as in you know how to do it and you want to do it, then yes ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") I would prefer someone who knows how to do it and have done it before, rather than someone attempting to do it for the first time.

Kartoffelkuchen, here to help! Drop me a PM if you want me to help you, am on holiday for the next 10 days but then I could help you. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
Oh my. Very much so looking forward to Titan series.

Hey [@liquidhype](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/112415-liquidhype/) I had an absolute blast running the Vulcan pack through it's testing phase. I'll PM you a couple of minor things I've found and then I'll move on to Titan IV, and Ariane 5 and 6. I'll leave you and the peeps with some nice screenshots I took during a Vulcan 441 max payload test run.

![3XoNzGt.png](http://i.imgur.com/3XoNzGt.png)

![bzPifa4.png](http://i.imgur.com/bzPifa4.png)
So pretty ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)") ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

I'll PM you a couple of minor things I've found and then I'll move on to Titan IV, and Ariane 5 and 6. Sweet! I appreciate the help good sir. Glad you managed to have some fun whilst testing things. Btw, I saw Tory Bruno responded to your tweet regarding these images. Cool stuff my man, cool stuff.

Also, I'll get the bugs you reported sorted out and send you a new test download.

EDIT: On a sidenote, I found it funny that you chose to use the AJ60s and not the GEM63XLs ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

**Edited <time datetime="2016-08-10T13:41:13Z" title="08/10/2016 01:41  PM" data-short="7 yr">August 10, 2016</time> by liquidhype**

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, liquidhype said:
> 
> 
> EDIT: On a sidenote, I found it funny that you chose to use the AJ60s and not the GEM63XLs ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
> 

I find it funny that all the ULA images I've seen use AJ60s ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")

> 
> 
> Just now, CobaltWolf said:
> 
> 
> I find it funny that all the ULA images I've seen use AJ60s ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")
> 

I guess it is a mix between  how ULA first introduced Vulcan and people liking the look of the AJ60s more. I've been using the Vulcan a bunch the last couple of day for testing purposes, and I must say I am on #TeamAJ60 as well ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P") Vulcan looks really "clunky" with 6 GEM63XLs.

But with that said, the 3.81m core Vulcan looks pretty cool with a couple of GEM63XLs strapped to it. And yes, Vulcan is going to have 3.81m core *if* it ever flies with the AR-1 engine because of the dense RP1 fuel. The methaLOX core will initially be a 5m core, but expanded to a 5.4m core once they start flying ACES, as ACES is going to be a 212 inch diameter upper stage.
[http://www.nooooooooooooooo.com/](http://www.nooooooooooooooo.com/)
Sad to know that this is no longer happening ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

Enjoy your new life liquidhype, whatever that may be.
OMG one of my favorite mod is gone……So sad……
